text: Marcin Szymański (born 1 July 1972 in Poland) is a Polish retired footballer who is last known to have played for Galway United in the Republic of Ireland. ==Career== Szymanski started his senior career with Śląsk Wrocław in 1992. He made one hundred and ninety-three appearances and scored two goals.ŚLĄSKopedia Profile After that, he played for Polish club Górnik Polkowice, Irish clubs Salthull Devon and Galway United before retiring in 2005. == References == == External links == * Kocham Cię jak Irlandię * Polish Wikipedia Page * 90minut Profile Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Expatriate association footballers in the Republic of Ireland Category:Galway United F.C. players Category:Salthill Devon F.C. players Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Śląsk Wrocław players Category:Górnik Polkowice players
title: Marcin Szymański
